DOC.brief_summary: Oral administration of Alequel, a mixture of proteins derived from the patient's bowel will be tested in patients with inflammatory bowel disease.
DOC.brief_title: Oral Administration of AlequelTM for Patients With Inflammatory Bowel Disease (IBD)
DOC.detailed_description: Oral administration of Alequel prepared from patients biopsies will be tested in patients with inflammatory bowel disease to determine its anti inflammatory effect.
